info.name: Employee Management System API
info.description:
API collection for testing the Employee Management System REST endpoints.

## Base URL
http://localhost:3000

## Endpoints
- GET /api/employees - Get all employees
- GET /api/employees/:id - Get employee by ID
- POST /api/employees - Create new employee
- PUT /api/employees/:id - Update employee
- DELETE /api/employees/:id - Delete employee

request.description:
Retrieves all employees from the database.

**Expected Response:**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, count: N, data: [...] }`

Retrieves a single employee by their ID.

**Expected Response (Success):**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, data: {...} }`

**Expected Response (Not Found):**
- Status: 404 Not Found
- Body: `{ success: false, error: "Employee not found" }`

Test case for requesting a non-existent employee.

**Expected Response:**
- Status: 404 Not Found
- Body: `{ success: false, error: "Employee not found" }`

Creates a new employee record.

**Required Fields:**
- name, designation, email, contact, department, joiningDate, location

**Expected Response (Success):**
- Status: 201 Created
- Body: `{ success: true, data: {...} }`

**Expected Response (Validation Error):**
- Status: 400 Bad Request
- Body: `{ success: false, error: "..." }`

Test case for creating employee with missing required fields.

**Expected Response:**
- Status: 400 Bad Request
- Body: `{ success: false, error: "All fields are required" }`

Test case for creating employee with invalid email format.

**Expected Response:**
- Status: 400 Bad Request
- Body: `{ success: false, error: "Invalid email format" }`

Test case for creating employee with an email that already exists.

**Expected Response:**
- Status: 409 Conflict
- Body: `{ success: false, error: "Email already exists" }`

Updates an existing employee record. Only include fields you want to update.

**Expected Response (Success):**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, data: {...} }`

**Expected Response (Not Found):**
- Status: 404 Not Found
- Body: `{ success: false, error: "Employee not found" }`

Test case for updating a non-existent employee.

**Expected Response:**
- Status: 404 Not Found
- Body: `{ success: false, error: "Employee not found" }`

Deletes an employee record by ID.

**Expected Response (Success):**
- Status: 200 OK
- Body: `{ success: true, message: "Employee deleted successfully" }`

**Expected Response (Not Found):**
- Status: 404 Not Found
- Body: `{ success: false, error: "Employee not found" }`

Test case for deleting a non-existent employee.

**Expected Response:**
- Status: 404 Not Found
- Body: `{ success: false, error: "Employee not found" }`
